moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Long Feng
characters.description: leader of Dai Li, power hungry, evil as heck

moves.name: Smirk
moves.description: Long Feng smirks knowingly at his opponent, causing unease

moves.name: Mustache Bash
moves.description: Long Feng uses his mustache to throw tiny rocks at his opponent

moves.name: Manipulation
moves.description: Long Feng uses manipulation to get his opponent to attack themself

moves.name: Fire Arrow
moves.description: Long Feng shoots fire arrows at his opponent

new moves.name: Fire Arrow
new moves.description: Aang launches fire bolts at his opponent
